alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and northeastern Clay Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Cove Springs, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Picolata, Switzerland, Lakeside, Penney Farms and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay
